title: Ventas Down Over 9%, On Pace for Largest Percent Decrease In Over a Decade — Data Talk
text:
Ventas, Inc. (VTR) is currently at $65.69, down $6.78 or 9.35%

-- Would be lowest close since June 13, 2019, when it closed at $65.43

-- On pace for largest percent decrease since April 20, 2009, when it fell 10.68%

-- Earlier Friday, Ventas reported third quarter net income per diluted share of $0.23 compared to $0.28 in the same period in 2018

-- Currently down four of the past five days

-- Currently down two consecutive days; down 10.23% over this period

-- Worst two day stretch since the two days ending Feb. 9, 2016, when it fell 11.08%

-- Down 10.05% month-to-date; on pace for worst month since Feb. 2018, when it fell 13.67%

-- Up 12.12% year-to-date; on pace for best year since 2014, when it rose 25.17%

-- Up 15.67% from 52 weeks ago (Oct. 26, 2018), when it closed at $56.79

-- Traded as low as $65.51; lowest intraday level since June 14, 2019, when it hit $65.37

-- Down 9.6% at today's intraday low; largest intraday percent decrease since April 20, 2009, when it fell as much as 11.28%

-- Worst performer in the S&P 500 today

All data as of 2:50:06 PM

Source: Dow Jones Market Data, FactSet

(END) Dow Jones Newswires

October 25, 2019 15:11 ET (19:11 GMT)
